entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Remote images not working in Image tag in latest version on Android #15735
  • A NullReferenceException is thrown on Android in the GridLayoutManager when calling InvalidateLayout #15729
  • iOS: svg images only bit color, any toolbar image doesn't resize #15728
  • .NET MAUI, how to load the iOS crash report to Visual Studio #15726
  • Android Platform App Theme does not automatically update when switching themes #15723

Closed

  • All texts are upside down if using .NET MAUI Blazor App with Windows 11 Arabic #15556
  • Graphics view on MacCatalyst #15563
  • Shell on Windows: Tabbar redraw problems #6929
    Backlog
  • TabBar / Tab colours not working correctly on Windows #12386
    .NET 8
  • AngularJS is not rendering in WebView on Android #11007
    Backlog
  • FilePicker on MacOS does not always return the file picked #11088
    Backlog
  • [iOS/Catalyst] Button ImageSource does not reset when setting to null. #15006
    Backlog
  • Maui much slower then Forms in debug-mode #15713

PullRequests

Created

  • [Android] Fix issues setting Shell TabBar appearance. #15734
  • [android] improve performance of Shell flyout opening #15733
    platform/android 🤖, area/perf 🏎️
  • Refactor `IsRefreshing` property to separate animation and command execution responsibilities #15732
    community ✨
  • [net8.0] Use darc for packs from runtime #15731
    community ✨
  • [Android] Fix Button issue updating background brush type #15725
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, area/controls 🎮, control-button
  • [Tizen] Bump tizen preview6 #15724
    area/infrastructure 🏗️, platform/tizen
  • Use base Width and Height on Android PlatformGraphicsView #15721
    area/drawing ✏️, community ✨

Merged

  • [Windows] Fix issues setting Shell TabBar appearance #15690
    platform/windows 🪟, area/shell 🐢, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • Hook up ScrollViewer event tracking in Windows CollectionView #15555
    area/collectionview 📃
  • Update CODEOWNERS #15008
    area/infrastructure 🏗️, community ✨, partner/tizen
  • FilePicker on Mac Catalyst does not always return the file picked #13814
    area/essentials 🍞, community ✨
  • [iOS] Allow to remove the Image from Button #15624
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-button

Updated

  • Fix IsSpellCheckEnabled #15459
    area/controls 🎮
  • Optimize iOS selection synchronization #14613
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/collectionview 📃, community ✨
  • [CI] Remove template explosion on the maui templates build tests. #15365
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [Windows/macOS] Implement menu key accelerators #14740
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/desktop 🖥️, control-menubar
  • Manual updates 20230615 Android ecosystem nugets bumped #15685
    area/platform
  • [Essentials] add WiFi permissions on Android 13+ #14718
    area/essentials 🍞, community ✨
  • Remove HandlerImpl folder and put partial files together #14339
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Add PostNotifications to Permissions #14456
    area/essentials 🍞
  • Use Platform* Graphics APIs to match with the rest of the platforms #12818
    t/breaking 💥, platform/windows 🪟, area/drawing ✏️, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • Add SwipeItems to LogicalChildren #13864
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-swipeview
  • Fix issues setting Shell TabBar appearance #15447
    t/bug, t/breaking 💥, platform/windows 🪟, area/shell 🐢, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • Add basic Android automated accessibility testing #11097
    area/testing
  • [iOS] Handle focus changes for UIButton #10614
  • Style specificity #13818
    area/Xaml </>
  • [windows] ReadyToRun packages ahead of time #11744
    platform/windows 🪟, area/perf 🏎️
  • [Windows] Fix Border corners clipping issue #14403
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, area/controls 🎮, control-border
  • [iOS] Clear BindingContext when cell is queued for reuse #14619
    community ✨
  • Fix iOS picker placeholder text overrided (#15139) #15198
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨
  • Improvements Droid Lifecycle #2669
    area/lifecycle 🔁, community ✨, .NET 8 Planning
  • [X] Optimize OnPlatform element syntax #5611
    area/Xaml </>, area/perf 🏎️, .NET 8 Planning
  • [Windows] Fix crash swapping MainPage #14262
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/navigation 🧭
  • Loading images needs the screen scale #14807
    area/image :framed_picture:
  • [iOS] Avoid crash setting custom icon in SearchHandler #14634
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/shell 🐢
  • Remove "IsPresented/ShouldShowSplitMode" check #13497
    area/FlyoutPage
  • PanGesture notify Completed event moving outside View limits #15700
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/gestures
  • [Android] Allow full screen videos from WebView #15472
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-webview
  • [Windows] Implement ItemsUpdatingScrollMode on CollectionView #15601
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/collectionview 📃
  • [Windows] Fix CollectionView broken test #15584
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/collectionview 📃
  • [Android] Fix SwipeView not swiping using Label as direct content #14824
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-swipeview
  • [Android] Fix issue invoking ReturnCommand #14972
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-entry
  • [macOS] Implement IsEnabled property in MenuFlyoutItems #14920
    t/bug, platform/macOS 🍏, area/controls 🎮, control-contextmenu
  • Fix Label Multilinetruncation (MaxLines / LineBreakMode) #14918
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-label
  • [Windows] Allow to customize the Shell FlyoutIcon #14663
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/shell 🐢
  • [Android] Fix gif animation initial state #14295
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-image
  • [Windows] Changes in SwipeViewHandler #11229
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-swipeview
